original_text: And Israel defeated him with the edge of the sword and took possession of his land from the Arnon to the Jabbok, as far as to the Ammonites, for the border of the Ammonites was strong.
korean_text: 이스라엘이 칼날로 그들을 쳐서 무찌르고 그 땅을 아르논에서부터 얍복까지 점령하여 암몬 자손에게까지 미치니 암몬 자손의 경계는 견고하더라

sentences.original_text: And Israel defeated him with the edge of the sword
and took possession of his land
from the Arnon to the Jabbok
as far as to the Ammonites
for the border of the Ammonites was strong
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 암몬 사람들의 경계가 견고했기 때문이라
